initial_description: A small, green creature with a mischievous grin appears. It looks like it hasn't had breakfast yet, and you might be on the menu.
A walking chest with hundreds of little legs trots up to you. Its lid opens slightly, revealing rows of sharp teeth. Friendly? Maybe not.
A dragon the size of a small dog hiccups, emitting a small flame. It looks at you apologetically before preparing to sneeze again.
A large, rocky creature lumbers into view. It seems to be pondering the meaning of life, or possibly just what to have for dinner.
A hairy individual howls at the moon, then checks his watch. 'Is it that time of the month already?' he mutters.
A pale figure in a cape appears, dramatically backlit. He pauses, waiting for applause that never comes.
A large, wobbly cube of jelly approaches. It jiggles menacingly, if such a thing is possible.
You see a perfectly ordinary chest. It winks at you. Wait, chests don't have eyes...
A floating orb with multiple eyestalks drifts into view. It looks like it's having a bad hair day, if eyes could have hair.
A peculiar creature scuttles towards you, its antennae twitching excitedly at the sight of your shiny armor.
A tiny, scaly humanoid appears, brandishing a spoon like it's the mightiest of weapons. It's adorably fierce.
A broom stands upright, bristles twitching. It eyes the dirt on your boots disapprovingly.
A small bush waddles towards you. It looks like it's trying to decide whether to offer you a flower or slap you with a branch.
A jellyfish-like creature floats by, telepathically humming an off-key tune. It seems more interested in making friends than fighting.
A sword hovers in the air, point aimed at you. It looks like it's trying to remember which end is the handle.
A disembodied hand scuttles across the floor. It's making frantic gestures that could either mean 'hello' or 'prepare to die'.
A tiny winged humanoid zips around your head, giggling mischievously. It seems to be playing a one-sided game of tag.
A cat-sized dragon lands on a nearby rock, trying to look fierce. It manages to be more cute than intimidating.
A skeleton walks in, its bones rattling like percussion instruments. It looks like it's one femur away from falling apart.
A bizarre mix of bat and mosquito buzzes towards you. It's eyeing your neck like it's an all-you-can-drink buffet.
A carefully manicured bush shaped like a unicorn gallops towards you. Its leafy mane flows in the wind, and its hedge-clipped hooves make surprisingly intimidating thuds.
A swirling mass of living ink rises from a fallen quill. It seems to be writing threatening messages in mid-air, though its spelling could use some work.
A mechanical warrior approaches, each step precisely measured. It stops briefly to oil its joints before raising its sword with mathematical precision.
A hulking figure made entirely of various aged cheeses lumbers forward. The smell alone could be considered a weapon.
A paper dragon unfolds itself from a nearby scroll. It looks delicate but those edges seem surprisingly sharp.
A serpentine creature made of bound books and loose pages slithers forth, apparently very angry about overdue library fees.
A humanoid figure of pure crystal steps forward, refracting light in dazzling patterns. It raises a translucent blade that chimes melodiously.
A portrait steps out of its frame, its subject now three-dimensional but still somewhat flat. It poses dramatically, waiting for the perfect angle to attack.
A steaming apparition rises from a abandoned bowl of soup, wielding a spectral ladle. The phrase 'you are what you eat' comes to mind.
A sphinx carved from marble springs to life, its stone wings creating a shower of dust. It opens its mouth to ask a riddle, but just meows instead.
A cluster of stars descends from above, forming the shape of a warrior. It brandishes a sword made of starlight, though it keeps losing its shape as the stars drift slightly.
A swirling vortex of yarn approaches, knitting needles orbiting it menacingly. Several half-finished scarves trail behind it like tentacles.
A figure assembled from countless tiny tiles shifts into view. Pieces occasionally fall off only to float back into place, making a sound like angry wind chimes.
A humanoid figure composed entirely of various mushrooms emerges from the shadows. Its armor appears to be made of shelf fungi, and spores puff out with each step.
A creature made of pure light refracts through a crystal, splitting into a rainbow of colored copies. Each one seems to think it's the original.
A mechanical bird wreathed in steam and magical flames soars overhead. Its gears grind in a way that somehow sounds like a battle cry.
A warrior made of pure sound waves materializes, each movement creating ripples in the air. Its battle cry is literally its entire being.
A giant humanoid woven from various fabrics towers above you. It brandishes a needle like a sword, trailing a thread that seems sharp enough to cut.
A construct made of interlocking puzzle pieces shuffles forward. Parts of it occasionally fall off and reassemble in different configurations.
A creature of shadow and brass rotates menacingly. Its gnomon points at you like an accusing finger as it prepares to tell you your time is up.
